item.title: Data Structures: Doubly Linked Lists
item.description: Doubly linked lists might be one of the useful data structures I like. Even though personally I lean more towards linked hash map, but I think they are similar in a way. To be honest, I have never even used linked hash map so I can’t really say. Anyways, I happen to be utilizing a doubly linked list in my project right now, so I wanted to go over it before I forget how it works again.
